[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/authentication](./authentication.md) &gt; [AUTHENTICATION\_METADATA\_CLASS\_KEY](./authentication.authentication_metadata_class_key.md)

## AUTHENTICATION\_METADATA\_CLASS\_KEY variable

The key used to store class-level metadata for `@authenticate`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AUTHENTICATION_METADATA_CLASS_KEY: MetadataAccessor<AuthenticationMetadata, ClassDecorator>
```
